title: 2  Paintings catalogue Jupyter Notebook
text:
The below Python code uses SPARQLWrapper to retrieve data from Wikidata based on a SPARQL query.

title: 3  3D model Jupyter Notebook
text:
3.1 3D model
This page shows a 3D model .stl file using the numpy-stl Python library found at https://pypi.org/project/numpy-stl/. This converts a .stl file to matplotlib and then displays as HTML.
<Figure size 640x480 with 0 Axes>
